title: Foolish.Wives.1922.1080p.Bluray.DTS.x264-GCJM
description:
Foolish.Wives.1922.1080p.Bluray.DTS.x264-GCJM

=======

A con artist masquerades as Russian nobility and attempts to seduce the wife
of an American diplomat.

1922's Foolish Wives, Stroheim's third film, was condensed from twenty-one reels
to seven. In 1972, though, film historian Arthur Lennig culled through museum
archives to create a partially reconstructed Foolish Wives that, at 143 minutes,
is the most complete version we're ever likely to see, restoring menace and
detail to Stroheim's epic melodrama of European hypocrisy and American
earnestness.

=======

Encoded from the Kino blu-ray release.
Includes original piano score by Sigmund Romberg, performed by Rodney Sauer.
Includes audio commentary track with Richard Koszarski.

Encode is restored (duplicate frames removed) and plays at 19.986 fps.
Film damage a'plenty, enjoy it for what it is.
